name: Lunar Ranch
description:
You're an alien who crash landed on the moon after your ship malfunctioned. Luckily, you aren't alone! There are three, very advanced and well-populated colonies nearby, and one of the inhabitants is even nice enough to teach you how to make a living while you're here. 

Experience what it's like to be a humble farmer on the moon and form relationships with the humans and robots that live there as you work to make enough money to fix your ship and return home.

Cheat Controls:

L - give 1,000 Starbits to player (can hold)

U - Increment Time

Cheats on by default:

-player starts the game with all Equipment and Seeds available in the Inventory

-Infinite Water Supply

-Infinite Seed Supply
